title: Eco-Friendly Studio Haven with Shared Courtyard and Rooftop Deck in Karlikowo, Sopot
description:
Discover an inviting modern studio designed with sustainability in mind. Natural light pours through large windows, highlighting the airy living space complete with underfloor heating. The cozy layout seamlessly integrates your bedroom nook and open-plan living area, while stylish finishes offer both comfort and function. Step out to enjoy exclusive access to a shared rooftop deck, perfect for sunny days and social evenings.

Make use of the beautifully landscaped shared courtyard, giving you a quiet escape from city energy. This thoughtfully planned studio measures 32 sqm. You benefit from secure private parking— a precious commodity in this desirable locale. Bathrooms are sleek and contemporary, and the space welcomes small pets, making it a delightful option for modern pet owners caring about their ecological footprint.
neighborhood_description: Located in peaceful and pet-friendly Karlikowo, this studio sits at the crossroads of Sopot's relaxed suburban atmosphere and its vibrant city rhythm. The area is renowned for its tree-lined streets, parks ideal for pets and access to public transport and safe bike lines. Families and young professionals alike appreciate the proximity to reputable schools and the beach, all within a friendly urban community.
lifestyle_benefits: commuting by bike or public transport
target_buyer: Ideal for eco-conscious singles or couples—especially pet owners—who value access to green areas and community spaces, with an eye for efficient and modern urban living.
market_positioning: Uniquely positioned as an eco-friendly, pet-adapted studio in Sopot's sought-after Karlikowo district, blending sustainable features and modern convenience in a secure, mid-range price point.
